New Year. New Look. New Update.
PDF Reader Pro brings you a major update to kick off 2018!

Work Perfectly with iOS11 & iPhone X
•Unlock your app or private folder using Face ID
•Move files between apps using drag and drop in split view

New Year. New Look. New Update.
PDF Reader Pro brings you a major update to kick off 2018!

Work Perfectly with iOS11 & iPhone X
•Unlock your app or private folder using Face ID
•Move files between apps using drag and drop in split view

- Stability improvements and bug fixes
- Fixed the issue of random crashes when viewing PDFs in crop mode
- Fixed the issue of displaying Chinese text watermark
- Support to apply OCR to your image files
- View MS documents in full-screen mode

・ iOS 12 optimation
・ Compatible with iPhone Xs, Xs Max, and 8 Plus
・ Files app supported - Directly access and view files stored in PDF Read
